      • isBound

        public boolean isBound()
        Description copied from interface: Solution
        Returns true if all the solution variables are bound, i.e. if isBound(name) returns true for all solution variables.
        Specified by:
        isBound in interface Solution
        Returns:
        true if all the solutions variables are bound.
        See Also:
        Solution.isBound(String)

      • isBound

        public boolean isBound(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: Solution
        Returns true if the domain of the solution variable with the given name is a single value, i.e. getMin(name) == getMax(name).
        Specified by:
        isBound in interface Solution
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the desired solution variable.
        Returns:
        true if the domain of the solution variable with the given name is a single value.

      • log

        public void log(int varPerLinePar)
        Logs the solution in the information log. Logs only "varPerLine" variables per line. By default varPerLine = 8.
        Specified by:
        log in interface Solution
